trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around July 3rd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my younger brother were watching our campfire at about 10 PM, my friend just left and it was me and him, soon as I looked up to the stars since it was a very clear night, I saw an orange object that looked to be a triangle or disc It moved so fast I could not tell, this moved at least 4X faster than any plane that goes by here, which we have a lot, this object did not blink and was one solid color which somewhat pulsated which was this orange glow. It did multiple maneuvers and when I tried to get a better look it was already gone, it lasted about 20 or so seconds, maybe less. Whatever it was it wasn't a plane, these go by all the time and they never could move that fast and do so many maneuvers, this thing was able to do a figure 8 then move away so fast it was incredible, it seemed like it came out of nowhere too.
Summary: A fast flying orange glowing triangle.
